titleStmt.title: Receipt for Tax Payment in Kind
titleStmt.author: Sarapion

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: (Recto);;In the sixteenth year of Emperor [Caesar] Hadrianus Antoninus Augustus [Pius . . . . .]. We, Sarapion and associates, sitologi of the village of Karanis, have received [- - -] . . . from the produce of the same 16th year, for domain-land of Stratonos, from [Harpochration] son of Posis, . . . (artabai) of wheat; for epibole, . . . artabai [- - -]; and Pachon 14, to the same account, two artabai of barley [- - -];;(Verso);;Epeiph 2 [- - -];[of the corn(?)] measured in year 16 [- - -] . . .; [- - -] for domain-land of Stratonos from Harpochration son of Posis, 4 artabai of wheat, for transport charge, 1/12, = 4 1/12 artabai of wheat; for epibole of Marcus Antonius Priscus, 11/12; for additional charges, 1/6, = 1 1/12 artabai of wheat; [and] Pachon 24, from Harpochration son of Posis, 2 artabai of barley, for transport charge,1/24, = 2 1/24 artabai.
